overview_of_class: The death of the dinosaurs as well as theories and evidence for other catastrophic extinctions will be examined. Geologic time and the history of life on earth, plate tectonics, dinosaur classification and behavior, periodicities, cosmic occurrences, and the search for Nemesis, the "Death Star" will be included in the seminar. Four papers. First paper is autobiographical. Second and third papers are on assigned topics. Final paper may be fiction or research.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Short presentations most classes, discussions, films, demonstrations, examples of fossils.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value:
Grades are assigned for papers half on content and half on style (organization, grammar, sentence structure, spelling, etc.). Papers 2 and 3 count 20% each. Final paper is worth 20% for written assignment and 20% for oral presentation. Class assignments comprise the remaining 20%.

NUMBER OF WRITING ASSIGNMENTS & THEIR LENGTHS
Paper 1 (1 page)
Paper 2 (2-3 pages)
Paper 3 (3-4 pages)
Paper 4, can be fiction, (7-8 pages)
